page.title: 04 THE ABBERD BROOK - CALNE
page.content: The brook in Calne is a bit of a mess but we have ducks and ducklings in there. People push trolleys in the brook and scatter rubbish in the streets which go into the brook and make a mess. There is foam in the brook, it makes it look very untidy and the water looks so murky. Stinging nettles are growing all around the brook. There are little minnows darting about and people fish in the brook but don't catch much. There are some chemicals in the water. I think that is what is making foam in the brook. Sometimes in summer a swan comes to the brook. I don't know why. The baby ducks have grown but some eggs get stolen.
